text: "C'mon People (We're Making It Now)" is a 2000 song by Richard Ashcroft and is the tenth track from his debut studio album Alone with Everybody and the third single. It went to number 15 in Scotland, number 21 in the United Kingdom and number 82 in Germany. ==Track listing== Standard # "C'mon People (We're Making It Now)" (album version) # "Make a Wish" # "For the Lovers" == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Richard Ashcroft songs
title: C'mon People (We're Making It Now)
